version_description:
Game Improvements and Bug Fixes
1. Fixed several bugs involving double terrain.
2. Fixed the problem of stairs can be abnormally built in terrain.
3. Fixed several bugs involving floating road network.
4. Fixed the bug of having abnormal sound when cutting spikes.
5. New series of weekly events.

1. New weapon: Uzi, has a maximum rate of fire and a capacity of up to 50 rounds, high stability, and good damage.
2. New challenges: Thank, the most lethal enemy ever, capable of producing rare supplies including helicopters.
3. Random Card Room will appear on the land of LDRS, explore them!
4. Thermal energy can be produced by some of the facilities or furniture, it can help you recover your HP and hunger pts.
5. New stronghold: Military Base, located on an isolated island, on the west side of the land of LDRS, possessing a huge amount of supplies.
6. New Vehicles: The Boat and The Helicopter.
7. The social server goes online! After the update, survivors can rent and manage your own server!

1. Upgraded anti-cheating detection mechanism, we expect to complete algorithm optimization within 2 weeks.
2. Optimized spams reporting on chatting channels, and feedback will be sent to the reporters.
3. The “all channel” speech and information display are currently not supported in the game (will be supported again after the next major version is updated to optimize the display rules) Fixed the problem of floor penetration in strongholds.

1. New Vehicle Added! Log in to unlock the garage system and get your new vehicle！
2. New Background Added! Update to active!
3. New System: Escape from the explosion!
4. New Facility: Glider!
5. New Facility: Electromagnetic Turret!
6. New Weapon: Grenade Launcher!
7. New Challenge System Added!
8. Game Improvements and Bug Fixes.
Game Improvements and Bug Fixes
Game Improvements and Bug Fixes

1. A New AI system added. The weapon of the turret and the vehicles will attack the players first and attack the monsters secondly.
2. New tasks about the Grenade Launcher was added to the achievement system.
3. The Capacity of Water Bottle was increased to 5000.
4. Optimize the reset logic of the vehicle.
5. Optimize the appearance logic of the Choice Pack.
6. Optimize the appearance logic of the owned skins.
7. Simple Oil Drum Bomb, Handmade Charge and Military C4 Explosive won’t be recorded into the building limits.
8. Optimize the unusual color of the character hair.
9. Fix the bug caused the unusual death or couldn’t take off issue when the hunter wing was lack of oil.
10. Building limits of the base turned to 200, other buildings turn to 800.
11. Fix the repeat appearance bug of the mall currency.
12. Fix the bug of the invisible characters in the iPhone devices.
13. Anti-Cheat system updated. A new detecting system added.

New Version ◆ Aurora Project is online!

1. Operation Base Added! Brand New Map Awaits!
2. Material Transportation System Added! Transfer the materials between the battle and the base!
3. Base Exclusive System Added! Exclusive recipes are available! Enjoy more casual gameplays!
4. Zombie Waves Attack! Survive to the end!
5. Base Transaction System Added! Trade for whatever you want!
6. Base Construction System Added! Build your personal shelter!
7. Base Bounty System Added!
8. Base Score System Added!
9. Game Optimization!

Brand new Hunter Wing: Skateboard is coming!

Here are some important update,
- New functions are open now! Save your base in blueprint then you can build it at anywhere any time, - even share it with your friends!
- High-capacity helicopter is available! Easier and faster to drive your teammates.
- Merits system released! Get awards by obtaining Growth Points to upgrade.
- Group dance is available now!
- Add Newbie’s exclusive shop, gift packs here are all discounted!
- Add Titanium Ore as a kind of resource to upgrade your building.
